alert.note: Alert for Covington; Franklin; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lawrence; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 20 at 3:23PM CST until December 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 14 possible. * WHERE...Franklin MS, Lincoln, Lawrence, Jefferson Davis, Covington and Jones Counties. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...A prolonged period of subfreezing temperatures may cause pipes to burst. Bitterly cold temperatures and wind chills will result in hypothermia and become life-threatening to those with prolonged exposure or without access to adequate warmth.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Covington; Franklin; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lawrence; Lincoln
